2. Details of Damaged Goods:

The following items were confirmed as damaged upon inspection:

Dear Hani,

With reference to the property insurance policy of H&C, please note that there while unloading at the The Avenues Mall parking area for a return shipment, three boxes accidentally fell from the transport trolley.

1. Key Incident Details:

*	Insured Party: Habchi & Chalhoub
